alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Jones; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 03 at 10:36PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Callahan, southeastern Jones, Shackelford and northeastern Taylor Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1036 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Fort Phantom Hill, or near Hamby, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Albany around 1105 PM CDT. Ibex around 1115 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Impact, Lake Fort Phantom Hill, Mccarty Lake, Us-283 Near The Callahan- Shackelford County Line, The Intersection Of Us- 180 And Farm Road 600 and Us-180 Near The Shackelford- Stephens County Line. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 283 and 289. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
